comments.body:
Works fine for me - prints a message when you are interrupted by your target or your focus, which is what it is configured to do. The only thing wrong with it that I can see is that you have your tags in the text output slightly wrong. Combat Event icons should not use the [Unit] tag - they should use the [Source] and [Destination] tags.

In addition, if you are using the [Source] tag but are not filtering your source by units (you are in this case, so ignore this), you should not use the [Name] tag with it. The same goes for [Destination] - if you are using the [Destination] tag but are not filtering your destination by units (you aren't in this case, so do this), you should not use the [Name] tag with it.

The revised text output should be "C: [Spell] by [Destination]". Everything else seems to be working perfectly as you have configured it, so I don't know what the problem is. Perhaps if you tell me what you want the icon to do then I could help you figure out what you need to change.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Hi

I dont want look when i am interrupted but when I have interrupted :) I want announce to /say when i have interrupted a spell.

I dont think you are try this one ?


> Posted by CurseForge user g0ldo

Edit: i have retry and they are a big misstake ;)

Your feature is for if u are interrupted: "My [Polymorph] is interrupted by [Target]'s [Pummel]" work fine any way.

But i dont need it, where is the feature for announce when i have interrupted a spell ? Like: I have interrupted [Polymorph] on [Target] with [Pummel].


> Posted by CurseForge user g0ldo

You need to set the source unit of the icon to "player" then. Leave the destination units alone. In your text output, you should be using the [Destination] tag to refer to who was interrupted.

Something like this should do what you want it to:

^1^T^SType^Scleu ^SSourceUnit^Splayer ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SAnnouncements ^SChannel^SFRAME ^SLocation^SGeneral ^SText^SC:~`I~`interrupted~`[Spell]~`on~`[Destination]~`with~`[Extra] ^SEvent^SOnCLEUEvent ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_INTERRUPT^B ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N62020^S~`~| ^Sicon^^
